Class DatabaseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.DatabaseManager

extends java.lang.Object
    Handles items that need to be pulled and placed in files

      • checkUser

        public int checkUser​(java.lang.String n)
        Checks n user with users in the data base to see if they exist
        Parameters:
        n - A string formated as "UserId | UserName"
        Returns:
        -1 if the user is not found and !=-1 for the index of the user if found
